author: Second Wind
description:
This video is brought to you by GameMaker, the free, fast, and easy-to-use 2D game engine that’s helped power modern classics like UFO 50, Antonblast, and Yahtzee’s Starstruck Vagabond – https://opr.as/SecondWind-3

This week on Hidden Gems, KC, Jesse, and Jess play Ra Ra Boom -- https://store.steampowered.com/app/2335060/Ra_Ra_BOOM/

If you dig Hot Monday Energy, consider supporting us over on Patreon -- https://www.patreon.com/SecondWindGroup

Check out some of our lovely merch over at our DFTBA store -- https://store.dftba.com/collections/second-wind

Get your Adventure is Nigh! plushies over at Shark Robot -- https://sharkrobot.com/collections/second-wind

Listen to the Hidden Gems songs here -- 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bUWISImXpRQ
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=szSjVtdyO6w
title: Beating 'Em Up Cooperatively in Ra Ra Boom | Hot Monday Energy

author: Second Wind
description:
This week on Wishlist, KC Nwosu takes a look at five upcoming anime-inspiring games.

Yasuke: A Lost Descendant – https://store.steampowered.com/app/2446760/YASUKE_A_Lost_Descendant/

Abyss x Zero – https://store.steampowered.com/app/2872300/ABYSS_X_ZERO/

MightReya – https://store.steampowered.com/app/3077640/MIGHTREYA/

Asuka x Redline Reverie – https://store.steampowered.com/app/3357310/ASUKA_x_Redline_Reverie/

Super Alloy Crush – https://store.steampowered.com/app/3092360/Super_Alloy_Crush/

If you dig these recommendations, consider supporting us over on Patreon -- https://www.patreon.com/SecondWindGroup

Second Wind Merch: 
https://store.dftba.com/collections/second-wind
https://sharkrobot.com/collections/second-wind
title: Five Anime-Inspired Games to Keep an Eye On | Wishlist

author: Second Wind
description:
On this week’s episode of Windbreaker, Yahtzee, Marty, and JM8 attempt to make a D&D-esque alignment chart for video game developers, ranging from Lawful Good to Chaotic Evil.

If you dig the stuff we make, consider supporting us over at Patreon -- https://www.patreon.com/SecondWindGroup

Check out our new shirts over at DFTBA -- https://store.dftba.com/collections/second-wind

title: Making a Video Game Developer Alignment Chart | Windbreaker Podcast
